cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,1st July 1919.(Repeated by Commander-in-Ghief to Constantinople.)(Received 2nd July, 11.15 a,m.)S8.15. 1st July. Wire from Malleson dated Meshed, 29th June :-" Trans-Caspia. On 25th June Bolsheviks advanced in force and occupied Dushakh. Fighting proceeded all day on a line north and south through Arman Sagad, but further Bolshevik advance was stayed. On 26th-27th-28th. June no further fighting took place."
